org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util

类 ExceptionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.ExceptionUtil

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class ExceptionUtil
extends Object
    This class handles the different interruption classes. It can be: - InterruptedException - InterruptedIOException (inherits IOException); used in IO - ClosedByInterruptException (inherits IOException) - SocketTimeoutException inherits InterruptedIOException but is not a real interruption, so we have to distinguish the case. This pattern is unfortunately common.

    • 构造器概要

      限定符 构造器和说明

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExceptionUtil

        private ExceptionUtil()

    • 方法详细资料

      • isInterrupt

        public static boolean isInterrupt(Throwable t)
        返回:
        true if the throwable comes an interruption, false otherwise.

      • rethrowIfInterrupt

        public static void rethrowIfInterrupt(Throwable t)
                               throws InterruptedIOException
        抛出:
        InterruptedIOException - if t was an interruption. Does nothing otherwise.

      • asInterrupt

        public static InterruptedIOException asInterrupt(Throwable t)
        返回:
        an InterruptedIOException if t was an interruption, null otherwise
